name: seller_credit_amount
title: How much money would you like the seller to credit back to you?
label: Credit Amount
description: This is money that the seller would normally pay to the buyer's agent if you weren't using HomeBuyMe.
tips: The seller credit amount may be limited by your lender and the purchase price.
small_print: The final credit amount must be approved by your lender and documented in your purchase agreement.

seller_credit_amount.name: seller_credit_amount

suggested.hint: Be careful not to ask for too much credit as it could weaken your offer.

seller_credit_amount.tooltip: Enter the amount of seller credit requested
